Hi there, The moment i have uploaded aprox 16 - 18 GB per DVD (Torrent) and there are enough Seeders i'm adding the next DVD (Torrent) to the site. I will watch the previous torrent and seed some extra if required, but i also noticed that a lot of seeders are not seeding anymore.

I'm uploading aprox. 40 - 60 GB a day for these LOST DVD's
